projects.title: Learners-Practice-Test
projects.bodyText:
- A learner's practice test for a driver's license is like a trial exam before the real one.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **PHPMail**.
 - Mobile first using bootstrap

projects.title: Registry Connection's web application
projects.bodyText:
- A Cab Sharing web app made using **Django** for **VIT** Students. People can create a new cab or request to join an existing cab.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **SendGrid**.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.

projects.title: This Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that **automatically silences** your phone during class hours, designed for **VITians**.
 - Option to select class **slots** and **custom time**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.
